description:
The aim of this module is to provide an understanding of the important guidelines, tools and practices of quality risk management that can be applied to all aspects of pharmaceutical quality including development, manufacturing, distribution, and the inspection and submission/review processes throughout the lifecycle of drug. The module will cover the history and philosophy of product quality management, the concept of quality by design, overview of major quality management systems such as "Six Sigma", "Total Quality Management", "Lean
Management" etc. The module will also provide an overview of various types of audits and inspections that occur in the pharmaceutical industry.
title: Pharmaceutical Quality Management
